1.content: Now where in this mare's life do you want to jump in?
1.title: So... how 'bout them ponies?

choices: Luna looks at the baby and remember her child
11.content:
Candance was in labor in Pony General, Shining Armor was holding her hoof trying to relax Candance while the doctor was preparing for the birth. Candance gave one last push...

I was brought into the world. I cried out as the light's hurt my new eyes and squirmed in the doctors grip. I was given to my mother who gently rocked me until I feel sleepily and drifted to sleep...

Candance looked over at Shining Armor and kissed them as they looked at their child. She had a tuff of a pink mane, she looked pretty, even for a newborn. She had tiny wings that could barely hold her weight in flight and a small bump of a horn that was hardly sharp in the slightest. The doctor unicorn left the newborn with it's parents as Celestia and Luna walked in.
11.title: She's so cute!!!

choices: No, Hypon (Luna's 1 month old son) was with her.
113.content: One month later, Rosnesta was playing with her toys. Candance was with Rosnesta and watched her closely and also played with her daughter. Shining Armor was on royal business, so She asked Celestia to come over so they could have a chat. Celestia accepted and started to fly to the Crystal Kingdom. Was she alone?

1132112111111111111121112111111112112111.title: He's on his bed

1132112111111111111121112111111112112111.content: Luna got on the bed and nuzzled Hypon. Luna: Sweetheart, please go outside, I worry about your health. It's not healthy to be coped up for so long. (Opens the other windows to let light in) Stop hiding from the world sweetheart, the world wants to see your beautiful face.

1132112111111111111121112111111112112111.content: Luna:(nuzzles Hypon) I know, dear foal I know. (Kisses Hypon's cheek) But we must press forward, I'm sure your father wouldn't too happy seeing his tough foal laying around while opportunities past him by. (A little playfully) If you don't, I'll just teleport you outside for a while, so try, OK?
1132112111111111111121112111111112112111.title: Next

1132112111111111111121112111111112112111.content: Hypon knew she was being playful and had the perfect counter to that. "Only if you catch me first."Hypon spoke with now a grin on his face and then took flight after running off of his bed, towards the balcony, and then took flight without a moment to spare. Luna just smiled and chuckled and flew after the little prince through the garden. Rosnesta was watching from the ground and was confused as could be, but then heard Hypon's laughter and she started to smile, but she did not join in just yet, for she waited for the right moment to start after him.

Hypon felt shattered when he couldn't tell his secret to Rosnesta about his pain from losing his mother and father in the same night. Hypon knew his mother would be back soon, but he would never see his father again or hear his voice ever again.

choices: Royal Etiquette Teaching for a Princess to a Prince
1132112111111111111121112111111112112111.content: Hypon used his magic to summon a bookmark and placed it where he was and then closed the book and looked up to Shining Armor and Rosnesta and spoke, "Good evening, Shining Armor, would you like me to help Rosnesta with her studies?" Shining Armor looked at the young colt who offered his help to teach her daughter who only a few months younger than himself and said, "If you like to help me teach Rosnesta, young Hypon, you may join our lesson." Hypon was mildly thrilled at the acceptance of the invitation and then hopped off the bed to join Rosnesta on the floor to help her learn.
1132112111111111111121112111111112112111.title: Hypon helps her

1132112111111111111121112111111112112111.content: Shining Armor then used his magic to bring two copies of a large book in front of them called "Royal Etiquette Teaching for a Princess to a Prince." Rosnesta looked at the book with confusion and didn't really seem interested in it as Shining Armor moves a blackboard in from of them. "So Hypon, since you'd reviewed this book around Rosnesta's age, care to give a brief summary for her?"
1132112111111111111121112111111112112111.title: Royal Etiquette Teaching for a Princess to a Pr...

1132112111111111111121112111111112112111.content: "Gladly." Hypon began to speak to Shining Armor and turned to Rosnesta and said, "This book teaches young princes and young princesses how to act in the customary code of royalty. From eating to royal balls, it covers all the areas of the royal lifestyle." Hypon then looked at Rosnesta and saw that she was...
1132112111111111111121112111111112112111.title: Sure

You know she's so young and delicate, I'm not sure we should. Shining Armor: We'd be gone for a week, two days on trip over, three days in town and two back. I'm sure she'll be fine, it's not like we're not gonna be right there.

I guess... a year minimum. Luna:(horrified) That's terrible, oh... my poor husband... I've been so worried. He laughs and smiles like he's fine but I know he's in pain, he doesn't want to worry me or Hypon. Celestia: I'm sorry about shoving this on you. (Hugs Luna) Luna: No... I needed to hear, thank you. (Hugs back)

choices: They arrive in the Crystal Kingdom
11423.content:
One year later after Rosnesta's birth, Luna and Cadance had an idea that would change Rosnesta, a playdate with Luna's son, Hypon Moonstone. Hypon and Rosnesta were always open to their parents but were shy around others when they were newborns. But after a year, Hypon opened up to other ponies and was able to speak a little bit, but Rosnesta, even though, she could speak, still was shy. Luna though it would be a great idea to have it at Rosnesta's party, since Hypon was a couple of months older than Rosnesta. Cadance loved the idea and had alot of the party planned ready the day before Rosnesta's party. Luna was able to find the perfect outfit for Hypon to wear tomorrow. His Father, Absolom Moonstone, nicknamed Absol, knew that this was a great idea to have the royal children meet for the first time.

Early the next morning, Luna and Absolom hugged Celestia good-bye and they took off in the carriage. Absolom brought one guard, who was one of Luna's newer gaurds, known as Ranger, because they wanted somepony to help Absolom, since he was told by Nurse Redheart to try to get his daily excerise, and since Absolom trusted Ranger, he wanted to show him the Crystal Kingdom and help him get his exercise, but there were also other things he had to tell Ranger, that nopony knows now except Ranger. Hypon was fast asleep in his mother's wings and dressed in his royal blue uniform that she picked out for him.
11423.title: A year later

115.content: A year fully passed since Rosnesta's birth and Cadence had an idea to have a birthday party in the Crystal Kingdom for her child. She knew her aunts would like to attend the party, so she sent the invites a month earlier. Luna looked at her invite and smiled and started to get her gift ahead of time while Celestia tried to find it a little later.
115.title: A year passes

12.content:
Rosnesta was a young foal now (about 5-8 years old) She was taught how to use her magic from her parents and learned how to fly from Candace. She was a very smart filly, but she still didn't have her cutie mark yet. But she knew it takes time for the mark to appear. But today was a good day for Rosnesta, it was her birthday. And she knew what it meant, a visit from the family, especially the Royal Family of Canterlot. But it was still hard times in Canterlot, Luna was banished and her husband was killed by a sickness, leaving their son, Hypon Moonstone, alone without his parents and was being taught by Celestia.

Early in the morning, Shining Armor woke up Rosnesta and Candace came in singing Happy Birthday to Rosnesta and carried her down, since the stairs were still hard for her, to the dining hall to have breakfast together as a family. After Rosnesta finished, Shining Armor informed her that Celestia was coming to visit for her birthday. Rosnesta knew when Celestia came to The Crystal Kingdom, Hypon came as well. Hypon was a big brother to Rosnesta, even though they were only four months different in birthday dates. Hypon was a medium sized black and grey colt and Rosnesta enjoyed riding on his back.

One hour passed and the horns rang through out the castle, meaning that Celestia was here. She enter through the front door and walked slowly to Candace, Shining Armor, and Rosnesta. Then, Hypon followed in, just as slow and very dressed up for a visit and walked next to his Aunt Celestia.

Hypon hugged her back and had a small smile.
Hypon: Hello Little Rose.

It's hard for me to do much in Canterlot. I've been blocked out of the old study and cant go outside without an escort.

And I hear her lullabies at night, me and her are connected, no matter the distance. She will never use me to cause disharmony. I know Auntie and Mom had that fight and I know she's protective of me, but she shouldn't force me to forget my own mother.

I

1312321112121112.content:
The mare had alot of fun during the night, the sun started to rise, but the partywas about to get better, the ponies then gathered around the stage where Mayor Mare stood.

Mayor Mare: Fillies and gentlecolts, as mayor of Ponyville, it's my great pleasure to announce the beginning of the summer Sun celebration.
(Ponies cheer)
Mayor Mare: Now before we witness the magic of the sunrise, there is one surprise left for you to witness. I present the Prince of Canterlot.
(A black Alicorn flew pass the onlooking ponies and flew into the air and then vanished and thunder rumbled)

Mayor Mare: (backing away) May I present and welcome to the stage, Prince Hypon Moonstone. (Gets off the stage)
And after a few seconds, a lighting bolt hit the stage, not causing any damage to any pony nor the stage, The black Alicorn appeared where the bolt struck.

Hypon: Welcome, Citizens of Ponyville, and welcome to the Summer Sun Celebration. Now to introduce the rulers of this land, the very ponies who shows us the day and night, please welcome, the Princess sisters, Princess Celestia and Princess Luna. (The curtain opens and they appear behind it and Hypon walks over to Mayor Mare's Side)

1312321112121112211111111111211111111121.content: Luna was a young and beautiful princess. She was very caring for her subjects and sister. She married to Sir Moonstone, a defender of the people and a royal guard, and had one son, Hypon Moonstone. She was a overall nice leader before the beginning of Nightmare Moon. But sunny days must share the sky with rain clouds. Weeks after their 6 year anniversary, Sir Moonstone was killed by a disease. Everypony in Canterlot was silent and the palace was a place of mourning. Then at Hypon's first birthday, Disaster finally struck. She would not bring the moon down and Celestia had to banish Hypon's mother and her only little sister. The palace looked horrible and Hypon saw everything and was fearful and crying after the events. Even though years have past, only time will tell if Luna will show everypony the princess from before the nightmare many ponies adorned and loved, instead of fear.
1312321112121112211111111111211111111121.title: Next

1312321112121112211111111111211111111121.content: Rosnesta actually cried when she read the story, she had to wipe away her tears before Twilight walked in.

1312321112121112211111111111211111111121.content:
Luna made her return as Nightmare moon like the prophecy predicted. Hypon help protect his friends, but was captured after the first challenge and placed into the ancient castle where she waited for the Mane Six to arrive. After the festival, Hypon and Luna were inseparable and tried to catch up since She was gone for most of his life, but the Prince himself claims, "She was never far away from me, She was always with me through thick and thin, She never left my side."
She then saw that was the last page of the chapter.

1312321112121112211111111111211111111121.content:
Hypon's Early Years:

Not much is know about the Colt years of The Prince of Canterlot, but many things happened outside the castle. Hypon saved a young filly in a magic duel and later, defeated the same pony in another duel which he earned his lighting bolt cutie mark. Hypon explained that the mark was a symbol of three things: Courage, Self-sacrifice, and not backing down. He and the unicorn duelist were friends and they both have connections still today. Hypon was moved to Flight School and pasted with flying colors. But then he was then a helping hand around Ponyville, instead of being all clean like any royalty should be, Hypon wanted to help his fellow ponies, he spoke to us and said, "I might be a member of the royal family, But I'm still just a pony. I care about my people, that they should be treated with respect ajd kindness. Even the old widow mares who've lost their loves, they need to be helpes and cared for. Helping others spreads harmony and happiness.

My dearest Rose,
My family is coming in a few days to meet with your parents, Of course, we both knew it was going to happen. But on other news, I've found a gift for you today here in Ponyville that I think you would love it. Its been so long since we've been with each other and I've been busy here with practice and some work. But I miss you so very much and I wish I could be there to kiss Your lips. But until then. (A rose appears) A rose for my little flower. I love you so very much. I hope ou have a good day and I'll see you by the weekend.
Your love and shining prince,
Hypon Moonstone.

151.content:
Trixe was never the kind of made to just sit around when she could be learning or showing how powerful and great she is. So she decides, since all other royalty ignored her, she would challenge Rosnesta of Crystal Kingdom. She, of course, thought that this would cause the other royal members to acknowledge her for her power. She wrote this letter.

To Princess Rosnesta of Crystal Kingdom,

Trixe the Great and Powerful demands that you appear for a magic duel in 3 weeks time. As such, Trixe requests that you treat this matter with the highest regard and respect. Appear at Ponyvile City Hall, at 6 in the afternoon. You are allowed one pony to be your second, in case you are ill or busy. Do not be late.

-Trixe the Great and Powerful

Trixe smiles at her letter and sends it.
151.title: Rosnesta and Trixe, Rose vs Magican

1513.content:
Fate though wasn't kind to Trixe, for the letter was sent to another member of the royal family and her old classmate in Magic Kindergarten, Prince Hypon Moonstone, son of Princess Luna and Prince of Canterlot. Hypon was resting when the letter appeared on his desk. He lifted his head and walked to the letter. His mane of Black and Grey was messed up but it didn't cover his ruby red eyes. Hypon read the letter and noticed Trixe's name and noticed that it was for Rosnesta and not for him. Hypon sent the letter to Rosnesta, but then used his magic to write Trixe a letter.

Dear Great and Powerful Trixe,
I'm writing this to inform you that you sent the letter to Rosnesta to me. It's been awhile since we talked, Trixe, too many years have pasted by. I see you still enjoy magic dueling, I still remember our matches in Magic Kindergarten. We were young ponies then. If your not busy practicing for your duel, I would like to see you and have a chat, just like old times. -Hypon Moonstone

Hypon then sent the letter to Trixe and waited patiently for her response, but also thought back a few days back, where he overheard from his mother, Luna, that all the royal members were receiving letters from somepony. Hypon paced his tower, waiting for his response from the Great and Powerful Trixe.

Dear Great and Powerful Trixe,

While I have not met you, I accept your request with great honor and respect. I hope that you will find our duel to be acceptable, I am unsure if I meet up to your standards but will try my best. I choose Hypon Moonstone to be my second, he will take care of me in case I am hurt. I look forward to our duel and wish you a good day.

Princess Rosnesta of Crystal Kingdom

Rosnesta:(wipes away some drool, opens the letter, drowsy, reads out loud) Dear Rosnesta, I never want to heard from you again, ever. -Hypon. (Awake, confused) What did I do to piss him off? (Scans the letter) It's from Hypon's parchment and his pen... (Very confused) Did I come on too strong or something?

1513211111111111111111111111111111111121.content:
Hypon was pacing in his room and was writting a letter to Rosnesta. It read:

My dearest Rosnesta,
It seem like we have a bit of foul play. Trixe has stolen your most recent letter from me while I was with my mother, helping her make the glorious night sky. I have no clue if she has sent any letter under my name or my penmanship, but my dear flower, be very aware of your surroundings. We both have entered this game of shadows and now you must defeat Trixe in the duel. I hope I didn't wake you from your rest, but I wouldn't send this letter unless it was urgent, Rose. This will be a test of faith. You must believe what you think is true and contemplate everything until you find out if it is true. I love you, my precious Rose. I love you with all my heart. Don't let Trixe's mind games trick you from the truth.
With Love,
Your prince of the Night, Hypon Moonstone

Hypon sent the letter after making a quick copy for himself to hold on to.

What the hell has gotten into that thick head prince?! And TRIXE?! He'd rather be with TRIXE?! Dagger:(yawns a small flame, tired) Then go kick his butt and let me sleep Princess. If he really ticked you off, go do something. Rosnesta: You know what, your right. (Teleports to Canterlot, ready to kill Hypon and possibly Trixe later)

1513211111111111111111111111111111111121.content:
Hypon was very angry when he saw this and his eyes turned blue and his voice went to his Canterlot Voice.
Hypon: (Canterlot Voice) Enough! Be still! (Gets their attention, Looks at Trixe) You are a betrayer of my trust. You took my letters, changed them, and made me and my love very angry. (Calms down) If I wasn't a good prince, I would put you in a inescapable nightmare and watch you suffer. But I am a kind prince and all I will do is this. I am moving the date to next week, instead of the end of the month, and you will be under house watch for the next 48 hours. (Looks at Rosnesta) I would like to show you my actual letter, since (looks at Trixe) Trixe distorted my letters. (Pulls out the letters from his pouch)

1513211111111111111111111111111111111121.content: Rosnesta:(slugs Trixe again, steps out of range and read his letter) I knew something was wrong. (Hugs Hypon) Sorry about your room, I'll clean it for you. Trixe:(looks hatefully at Rosnesta but saddly at Hypon before she goes into her room and locks the door) Get out of my house.
1513211111111111111111111111111111111121.title: Next

1513211111111111111111111111111111111121.content:
Hypon whispers into Rosnesta's ear then she goes off to the castle, while Hypon stayed behind to clean up the mess in Trixe's house.
Hypon: (to Trixe) You know this is the second time I've done this for you, Trixe. (Continues to clean) I'm not angry, Trixe. But I am disappointed. You have been a close friend to me, Trixe, and this is the first time you've done something this major. I wont put you under house arrest, but I want to leave you with a kind warning. I know you didn't have much of a family, but I treat you both, you and Rosnesta, as sisters and as family. I care alot about both of you and I don't want one or both of you to severely injury yourselves. (Lays down a light blue flower next to a book that was open, goes close to the door) I wish you the best of luck, Good night, Trixe. (Heads to the door)
1513211111111111111111111111111111111121.title: Next

1513211111111111111111111111111111111121.content: Trixe:(steps out) Trixe did it because Trixe don't feel Rosnesta should be your mare, Trixe still feel so.

1513211111111111111111111111111111111121.content: Hypon: But you could of been killed just now by Rosnesta. I don't want a dear friend of mine to be murdered.
1513211111111111111111111111111111111121.title: Next

1513211111111111111111111111111111111121.content: Trixe: And Trixe wants you to be with a good mare, not Rosnesta with her short temper.
1513211111111111111111111111111111111121.title: Next

1513211111111111111111111111111111111121.content: Hypon: You cant choose who I can fall in love with, Trixe. Only I can. We all have our opinions, but I love her. (Pauses) But Trixe, you have been a very close friend to me since Kindergarten. I care about you and I don't want you to hurt yourself.
1513211111111111111111111111111111111121.title: Next

1513211111111111111111111111111111111121.content: Trixe:(quietly) We'll see about that, won't we. (To Hypon's face) Trixe refuses to give up, it is not her way with small tasks such as this to give up. (Moves Hypon outside her house with magic) Go home to your tower, let the big mares handle this. (Closes and locked the door)

When Rosnesta say that, Hypon was worried.

1513211111111111111111111111111111111121.title: Next

Rosnesta:(calmly sips some wage)

Rosnesta:(calmly) Relax, she's nothing compared to me. She'll lose easy.

152.content:
Rosnesta looked over her kingdom and over Equestria, chaos was everywhere and there was no end in sight. All the royalty was captured, well that's not all true, but it wasn't for the good either, Rosnesta was the only normal royal pony left, but Hypon, was captured and turned into a dark alicorn of disharmony, controled by Discord, the master of Disharmony and Chaos. Dark Prince Hypon and Discord ruled over Equestria with an iron hoof and trapped Equestria in eternal chaos and disharmony.

But to know what happened, we must go back three days, back at the royal family reunion, Hypon was watching all the royalty surround Celestia and his mother Luna. Twilight, her friends, and Rosnesta were outside chatting when Hypon stepped outside.

Hypon: (smiles) Hello Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash, Applejack, Rarity, Pinkie Pie, Fluttershy. And Hello to you as well, Princess Rosnesta. (Bows to her)

Hypon was a gentlepony to heart, cared about his friends, family, and the people of the Kingdom of Canterlot. His black and grey mane showed he was from Luna's side of the family and was a Prince of the Night. His cutie mark was based on his courage to stand up against evil and disharmony and rewarded him a single lighting bolt. Many were puzzled by the mark and wondered why he wasn't given a moon like his mother, but he never doubted his mark, but he had a destiny to play and so did Everypony in Equestria.
152.title: How did things get this bad?

1521.content:
Rosnesta hugged Hypon, since they were close family.
Rosnesta: Hey Hypon. (Smiles)
Hypon: (smiles)
1521.title: Next

15212.content: Twilight: It's been a while since you were here Rosnesta. Rosnesta: Yeah, things have been kinda busy back home.

1521211111111111111.title: Next

15212111111111111111.content:
Hypon just smiles, but then turns back at the statute.
Hypon: (in mind) I know your watching me, Discord. I'm not scared of you

152121111111111111111.content: Hypon felt the dark laughter of Discord's voice in his head. Discord:(eyes glow red, stays a statue) We'll see. You may want to wake up. (Hypon blinks and finds himself on the ground with the mares huddled around him) Twilight: Are you OK? You just fell over.
152121111111111111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111.content: Hypon: I don't know, but I think Discord is trying to mess with my mind, I can feel his eyes watching my every move.

15212111111111111111111.title: Next

152121111111111111111111.content: Hypon: This already is bad news.
152121111111111111111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111.content: The ponies move away from the statue, which seemed like it was just rock. Applejack:(frowns) Are ya sure ya didn't image it? It seems fine to me.
1521211111111111111111111.title: Next

15212111111111111111111111.content: Hypon: I'm certain, Applejack. I don't think I would just imagine red eyes or hearing his laugh and voice. Nor would I just fall over by my own means. I know he has something to do with it. Remember, Discord played mind games with all of you before, now he's going after me. I know it doesn't make sense, but Discord loves not making sense. (Glares at Discord's Statute)
15212111111111111111111111.title: Next

152121111111111111111111111.content: If a pile of rocks could look innocent, Discord's statue looked so innocent you could probably see a halo. Applejack: Alright Hypon, just making sure.
152121111111111111111111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111.content: Hypon: (Sighs) The question is how can he talk to me when he is stone?
1521211111111111111111111111.title: Next

152121111111111111111111111121.content: Hypon: Then how come I felt him and his presence and heard his voice.
152121111111111111111111111121.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211.content: Twilight:(shrugs) I... I really don't know Hypon. Maybe it was real or just imagination. (Walks off with her friends, all unsure)
1521211111111111111111111111211.title: Next

15212111111111111111111111112111.content: Hypon: Your craftiness will run out, Discord. You cant hide it forever. (Walks away)

Hypon walked next to her.

15212111111111111111111111112111211111.content: Hypon: Alright, just checking Twi. (Goes inside the library)

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Applebloom was getting excited and wanted her to bunk with her, but it was Rosnesta's choice if she wanted to or not.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Rosnesta was a bit wary about bunking with Applebloom, since Rosnesta never had a sibling, she did not know if she would do something wrong. Rosnesta gave in after a lot of pleading and really cute faces that would melt your heart. So Rosnesta slept on the bed, which she asked not to but still did, while Applebloom slept next to her.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content:
Hypon was still contemplating on earlier events. Hypon wanted to know if he was cracking or if he heard the voice of Discord. Hypon kept looking in book after book until he was mad.

Hypon: (annoyed, closes another book, adds it to the giant pile next to him) Ugh. This is making me frustrated. I cant find anything close to what happened to me today. I know what I heard and saw today, I heard Discord's voice and I know he made me fall over, but it doesn't seem like there was anything like this in the past. (Puts the books back on the shelves) There has to be something. Discord never makes sense, that's how he almost won last time. He's Deceptive, so there must be part of the puzzle that sticks out. (Looks over to Twilight, who was reading a book and canceled me out and Spike, who's asleep in his bed, (sighs) I'll find out what he's planning.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: With Hypon

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Twilight looks over at Hypon while he's working. She was getting worryed since Hypon was the only one who supposedly saw a weakness.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Twilight looks at Hypon

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content:
Hypon opened up another book but then after few seconds, closed it.
Hypon: (getting more annoyed) Why cant I find anything? (Snorts) I've gone section by section of this library and I haven't found a thing and my own family wont believe what I heard or saw.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon suddenly feels dizzy and stumbles into a table. When Hypon shakes it off, he sees time has stopped and small thoughts coming from both Twilight and Spike were coming out in streams. Hypon then turns and sees himself standing still right in front of him.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon: What the hoof is going on?
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon hears Discord's laugh before suddenly Hypon appears at the garden where a small throne is placed with Discord sitting at it, chewing on books. Discord: Well well, it seems you so called friends don't even trust you enough to believe you.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon: I know they Believe me, Discord. They might doubt me, but I know your planning something, and shall not win, not now or ever. You are as deceptive as a snake and are a coward, hiding behind your tricks. You have no power against the pony sisters or the Son of Nightmare Moon. As long as your in that prison, you have no power. I'm not scared of you, Discord.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Discord: Didn't that mother of yours teach you manners? So rude, and logical. (Frowns) I hate logic, reason and fact. (Smiles) But you are wrong about one thing there little foal. If I have no powers, then how exactly am I talking to you while freezing time and causing disharmony all at the same time?
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon: (shocked but not convinced) There are more than one way to break a pony, Discord. You could just be in my mind, messing with me and trying to make me crack, but then again, What's the point of making sense. And I'm logical and was taught manners, Discord, but I don't think I should respect a cowardly snake. Your arrogent and overconfident and you underestimate the elements of harmony and our friendship. You'll be defeated, draconequus, and you will be a block of stone again.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Discord:(laughs) Cowardly snake? You are just a joke, the "great prince" Hypon, who can't even see the funny side of this little visit. (Frowns) You stand for harmony, yet you cause disharmony with every step and thought. I call that Ironic, at least I'm not a hypocrite. Every time you fight or spit out a name you cause disharmony.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon: (calm) Now how is this a funny visit, Discord? You've been haunting me all day. Plus I've been annoyed, that's why I been angry. If you didn't make me pass out, I wouldn't of cared. And I'm not a pony against my word. I fight for harmony, but I will never side with you for disharmony. All your doing is trying to trick me and decieve me. But I have one question, "Why did you chose me out of everypony who was in the garden and why not Twilight Sparkle, who defeated you last time?"
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Discord:(smiles) Ah youth, so arrogant and native, can't tell the truth from tricks. I am opening your eyes dear foal, it is acceptable to be resistant. By causing disharmony, I prevent you dumb ponies from realizing that you cause more trouble than I did. You all think you the best and deserve to know all, but cause disharmony with every move.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon: You try to show us the truth that we cause trouble than you did before?
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Discord: As we speak, disharmony is flaring around Equestria, but did you know? No, because you didn't know, that is the problem. After all, if you ponies lived all together, everyone would be happier.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon: Everypony needs different environments. We cant put all ponys in one place. I know we all rely on each other, but everypony cant live together, that would cause more disharmony than before.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Discord:(gestures to the area around them) And yet you find a good excuse for a simple matter.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon: I stating the facts, Discord. Cloudsdale is a only Pegasus city, Canterlot is mostly city and better know as a Unicorn City. Only Ponyville is the only place they have all three, but It's too small. There's no way we could ged everypony to meet in one place out of three empires that hold alot of ponies. It just cant be done.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Discord: Ah ha ha ha, she hasn't told you? Now that is a good laugh, hahhaha!
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon: What is it that she hasn't told me?

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Discord:(grins) Why should I tell you? How about I show you? Just give the word and we'll go. (Readies his fingers to snap)
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon: Do it.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Fine

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Discord grins as he snapped his fingers, suddenly Hypon started spinning, faster and faster until his environment disappeared and he was brought to a ruin of rubble. Discord:(grins) Welcome to Harmony, first empire of Equestria.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon: What in the name of Equestria happened here?
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Discord:(gestures around) Disharmony, by the sky loads. All three groups of ponies lived her in peace and tranquility, until...(grins) Celestia and Luna broke it up.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon: I don't believe you. I know my mom and Aunt. They would never do this.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: I don't believe you

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Discord:(laughs) You only know the lies they feed you. They cause such a large scale of disharmony that it killed each pony and caused the building to crumble into rubble. It took 3 months for everypony to die.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon looked at the rubble and started to get angry again and his horn started to glow.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Discord:(stands right next to Hypon) Your family did this, killed over 400 ponies of all types, and lied about it to Equestria. Do you know why Alicorns are so rare to find? (Gestures to the rubble) Celestia and Luna killed the others. Chrysalis and Candance are the only two left other than them, Chrysalis wants to take Celestia down while Candance hides in the lie because of fear. I know I'm terrible, but I can prove that I am not as bad as them. At least I don't kill.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Sometimes the truth just hurts like hell

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon: (angry) Which makes me the fifth Alicorn. (Horn starts to glow black and hits the rubble, disintegrating it to nothing, still angry)
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Discord:(grinning) Now you know the truth, eyes are open and are aware of the lies. Do you want to go back, or do you want to see the worst part of this little tale?
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon: (angry) If their are more lies, It better for me to know now.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Worst part

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Discord:(teleports Hypon to a rubble statue, rebuilds the statue) The worst part is... (finishes, the statue is of Celestia and Luna, both shown as heros) The ponies still thought Celestia and Luna would come in and save the day. They put their faith in their own murderers, and died without any help. They were abandoned once disharmony was put in and festered. This statute was made in during the first month.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon then blasted the statue into pieces out of anger.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Discord: Now do you believe me?
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon: Since you have proof, Yes. (Walks off from the rubble)
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Discord:(grins) So now that you know the truth, the whole truth, what will you do about it?
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon didn't give an answer
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Discord: Side with me, we will avenge those who were killed. Maybe even treat Equestria the right way. Side with Them, and try living that lie.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content:
Hypon then felt powered by a dark aura that kept wanting revenge for the dead and it showed around him a dark blue flame. His fur was now Dark Blue and Black and his eyes were blue now and his mark turned white.
Dark Hypon: Family means nothing without Trust.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Discord

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Discord:(grinning) Let us take over this pitiful Equestria and give it what it deserves.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Luna was pacing, waiting for her son to return. It was nightfall, way late for him to be out. Celestia tried to comfort her little sister, but it didn't help much.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Later in Canterlot

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Luna:(worried sick) Where is my little foal?! He should be home by now. Celestia: He will come back, he would never leave us.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Discord landed in the front of the palace while Dark Hypon sneaked in through his window and went down his tower.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon hears and sees Luna and Celestia feel the change and fly to the palace doors to stop Discord.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon follows them after they exit.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Discord:(waits inside the garden for the princesses, grins when they come in) Greetings dear murders. Celestia: How did you get free?! (Tries to zap Discord, Discord snaps his fingers and causes both royal horns to droop and not work) Discord: You can't stop me from winning this time, I have an ace in the hole. Luna:(wildly bucks at Discord, gets flipped) Twilight! Applejack! Rarity! Pinky Pie! Rainbow Dash! Fluttershy! Help us! (The mane 6 appear with elements)
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content:
Then there was dark laughter, then lightning struck in front of Discord, then appeared Dark Hypon.
Dark Hypon: (smiles evilly) Looks like the gang's all here. (Summons a Giant Cage out of ground and captures everypony) Don't bother using magic, it wont help you cause. The Nightmare has begun for Equestria.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Luna:(horrified) Hypon?! What are you doing?! Stop this at once!!
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content:
Dark Hypon didn't respond for a second, but saw Discord's mind was thinking.

Dark Hypon: Discord, they're not to be hurt or turned into stone. They should see what we have plans for. (To Luna) Just like you and your sister did in Harmony, your son rest dormant Inside of me. And as thou know about your darker half, I've shown mine. Your son hears you cry for me to stop, but he doesn't have control. Just as light bring the day, so must the moon bring thy night of coolness. You've both made us a rare race by slaying the others off, and caused fear for the rest of our Alicorn family. (Turns around and walks back to Discord's side) Only 6 alicorns remain and I've heard talk about a seventh. Still we are endangered and rare, but you had no right to cut everypony else away.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Dark Hypon's Rant

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Celestia:(angryly) What in Equestria are you blabbing about?! Luna:(starts to cry, quietly) Hypon... (the mane 6 try to destroy the cage)
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Dark Hypon: The cage cant be open, unless I open it. And I was talking about what happened in Harmony, the Alicorn capital of Equestria. But enough of this, Discord, let's leave the birds in their cage. (Vanishs)
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Rosnesta was sleeping under a Apple tree in Sweet Apple Acres, unaware of the recent events.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: With Rosnesta

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Rosnesta woke up and saw she was in a new location. She was moved to the Royal Garden in Canterlot and woke up by a bird that Fluttershy summoned by her melodious tone.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Later

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Rosnesta saw them and tried to free the ponies.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content:
Fluttershy: (quietly) Only Hypon can open the cage, and he's with Discord.
Twilight: We should of listened to him. He did try to warn us, but now this happened, just because we didn't listen.
Luna: (sad) Hypon... (a tear appears)
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Rosnesta opens the door into the palace and goes to the throne.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon and Discord weren't in the throne room.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: No one

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Rosnesta decided to try Hypon's tower.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Look somewhere else

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content:
The room was still the same as before and empty, but there was a note on his desk, and she could tell it was the real Hypon and not his dark side's.

"If your reading this, then I have succumbed under Discord's influence. I don't know how you'll be able to stop the darkness inside me, but I think this could free me. As everypony knows, Cadence and Shining Armor hold an element of harmony know as Love, since they had a child, there's a chance Rosnesta might have their power. Save me and don't believe the fake me."

P.s. To Rosnesta, I know if this puts pressure on you, but you have great potential, even though you didn't believe me about Discord, I still believe in you, Rose. I know you can do it. -Hypon Moonstone
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: No pony

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Rosnesta took a deep breath for courage and looked in Luna's tower for Hypon.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Dark Hypon was looking toward the chaos that Discord was spreading, since he didn't have the kind of disharmony.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon is interupted by Rosnesta slamming the door open.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Dark Hypon: Hello, Rosnesta.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Rosnesta:(walks towards Hypon, sad) What happened to you Hypon?
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Dark Hypon: (not caring) My eyes have been opened. Discord showed me about what happened at Harmony, the first empire of Equestria. My auntie and mother murdered our kin and family and we're now a rare kind, just because they murdered them all. They caused more disharmony than harmony. Only 6 are left, and I'm the only male of our kind. They had no right to kill our own kin and family.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Rosnesta:(close to Hypon, sad) Hypon... you know Discord lies and causes pain, why believe him?
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Dark Hypon: He had proof and shown me the destruction of Harmony. Either way, you and my so called friends didn't trust me about me hearing Discord's voice.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Rosnesta: We are your friends, how long have you been Discord's? If you are even friends. You are going against the ones who love you, we all love you but your doing the wrong things. Your acting like the evil you fight, it's scaring me. (Face to face with Dark Hypon) But I love you and I want you to be happy, if causing disharmony really helps you... then fine, do what you want. (Sad) Only know your losing everything you love. (Kisses Hypon, uses her power of love, then goes out the door)
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon then shook his head but then looked into the mirror and saw himself and was scared. Hypon: Is this what I've become? (Changes back and sad) This is my fault. He must pay. (Changes back into his Nightmare form but has control and flies to the garden after leapping of the balcony)
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Dark Hypon is stopped

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Discord was having a merry time causing changes to everything on Equestria. Discord:(laughs) Oh I'm so glad I came back.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon walked back to the cage that he locked his friends, mother, and auntie to unlocked them.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Unfortunately, Hypon was stopped by an invisible wall. Discord:(looks at Hypon) Come on foal, you think I would noticed your change? Don't even think about magic, I did some rewriting of your cage.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content:
Hypon: (eyes grows with an intense fire red color, turns around, Canterlot Voice) You caused me too much pain and frustration. You lied to me, turned me against my friends and my Rose, and my own mother and Aunt, you manipulated me. I should send you to the sun for what you've done to me and the Royal Family of Canterlot.
(Everypony, especially Luna, Celestia, and Twilight were shocked)
Hypon: You'll pay for this, Discord. (Angry) You will pay. I'm not scared of you or your washed up tricks. Your as threatening as a Foal, I'm your worst nightmare, Discord, and your going to be wishing this was going to be a dream.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Hypon's True Anger

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Discord:(looks at Hypon) Your threatening your superior? You got some guts foal. Harmony is real, their murders are real, you are closing your eyes again.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon:(cracks a little smile) Why do you think I went into my mother's tower? There was something I needed to know, and My instincts as an Alicorn led me to your downfall. (Charges his horn) Your done and through, Discord. (Releases a spell) You see Discord, this spell is a very powerful spell that surrounds a large area of Equestria and gives me a fraction of Magic of every pony: old, young, dead, or alive. (Eyes glow white) Including Harmony's Alicorn Population. I'm the superiorin our matchup and the fun has been definitely doubled, since it also taps into your cage, allowing me to tap into the Elements of Harmony. It's over, Discord. You've lost. (Charges the spell) Back to stone you go, back where you began.

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Discord:(smiles) I think not. (Vanished)

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon: I thought you all were In the cage still.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Celestia: Spell wore off.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon: Explains a bit. (Ears droop down) I'm sorry I caused all this chaos. I was angry and when I saw Discord for the second time, I snapped and lost my control. I guess the old saying is true, "Anger makes you stupid." (Slowly walks off towards the castle, looking down)
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Twilight:(runs after Hypon) Hypon, please, just wait.

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content:
Hypon stopped, but didn't turn around, since he was still in his dark form.
Hypon: What is it, Twi?

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Twilight:(hugs Hypon) We still care about you.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon: I know. But all I see in my view is a pony with dark side in him.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Luna:(walks up) You just need to control your dark half, I can teach you that.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Rosnesta was walking back to the Crystal empire, sad about how Hypon changed and how Discord took over Canterlot when Discord appeared in front of her. Discord:(laughs) Ah the young lover, you seem so cheerful. Rosnesta:(sad, angry) Fuck off, Discord. I'm not in a good mood. (walks around him) Discord:(annoyed) Are all you ponies so rude? Even Hypon seemed to be that rude. Rosnesta:(faces Discord) Why did you do it? Discord: I simply opened his eyes by showing him Harmony. He was very open to it, he figured out the truth. Rosnesta: You lied to control him, that is not truth, it's pathetic and cowardly. Discord:(smiles) So the loving Rose has a few thorns, not as kind as you show. I could show you what I showed him. Rosnesta:Why should I trust you? Discord: Because I can show you things that you have never seen, (holds out his hand) Take my hand and I will teach you everything I know and more. Rosnesta:(first looks at Discord with complete hatred, in mind) He will lead me to my death...still... if he is telling the truth... I could help ponies. I could do good for Equestria, even stop him easy. (Hesitantly moves her hoof near his hand, takes his hand) Discord:(smiles, causes them both to disappear from Equestria)

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content:
Hypon then felt a cold chill and twitched.
Hupon: It's time for me to finish what I started. Discord has Rosnesta and he must be doing the same thing as before. (Teleports to Harmony, sees Rosnesta, normal form but still has the powerful magic) Rosnesta!
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Hypon's Fight

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon saw Rosnesta transform into a darker pony. Her pink mane and fur earned to black and red colors, her eyes turned cold and hating. If Hypon could see Rosnesta's heart, he would have seen it turn black with hate. Black Rose:(hateful, to Discord, extremely powerful) You have done what you said, now I have no use for you. Discord:(laughs) You little freak, you honestly think you can take me ou- MMMMMH?! (Realizes his mouth was altered shut before Black Rose buckes Discord hard in the head, causing him to fly and land unconscious in front of Hypon) Black Rose:(hateful, notices Hypon) Well well, Mr. Dark Hypon, you and I need a talk. (Walks over, crushes rocks under her hoofs)
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: The Rise of Black Rose

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon: That side of me is gone, Rosnesta. Why are you doing this? This isn't you, Rose,
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content:
Hypon noticed she didn't stop walking closer.
Hypon: Rosnesta, stop this madness now, my fight isn't with you. Even if it was, I wouldn't attack you. Your the mare I love, Rose. You listened to his lies like I did, but you saved me by a single act of love. Why are you doing this? I've fixed my mistake and all I need to do is put Discord back into prison and everything he did will vanish. (She doesnt stop coming closer, Hypon sighs and runs up and kisses her)
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Although her mane and coat did not change, Hypon felt the powerful energy from Rosnesta start to lessen until Rosnesta collapsed in front of Hypon, not even strong enough to lift her head. "I should've hit Discord harder..." Rosnesta said before she passed out.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Works

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Black Rose slaps Hypon away and wipes her lips. Black Rose:(hateful) Thou dare kiss my lips?! Thou shall pay! (Zaps Hypon with thunder and lightening)
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Black Rose's thorn

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon dogde each bolt and clap. Hypon: This isn't you, Rosnesta. I know the real you. Maybe you need to see it yourself. (Blasts her with a memory spell)

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Black Rose deflects the spell and summons a Venus fly trap plant twice Hypon's size and thorns around the base.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content:
Hypon used a fire spell to burn the fly trap.
Hypon: Tell me why your doing this, Rosnesta. This is not the real you.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Black Rose:(hateful, roars) STOP CALLING ME THAT FILTH! I AM BLACK ROSE, THE CHANGE TO FIX THIS POINTLESS LIFE YOU ALL LIVE! I AM THE CHILL TO KILL, A MARE TO RULE ALL, THE ONE WHO WILL SHOW THIS WORLD THE LIES IT FALSED ON IT'SELF! (Summons Dark Shadows from the ground by the hundreds of thousands, roars) I. WILL. NOT. BE SILENCED! (Her Dark Shadow start marching, walks right through Hypon)

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon: Where is darkness there is light. (Summons an army of Light Soliders from hundreds to thousands to hundred thousands) Sorry, Black Rose, but you will be. I'm going to get my mare back. Soliders, attack the shadows and protect Equestria! (They attack the Shadows) This is our fight, Rose. And I have more power than you, since I tapped into a greater power. (Fires a Powered Knockback Spell)
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Black Rose:(hateful, darkly grins) We shall see. (Brushes off the knock back spell like it was a joke, summons thousands more Shadows and sends a Shadow ball curse at Hypon before she fires many more)
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon deflected each blast, trying to make time for a messenger soldier he sent to Canterlot to tell the princess and his friends.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Black Rose saw his attempts and caused each soldier near Hypon to burn with a black flame and turn into her Shadow before she summons giant ponies to fight. Black Rose:(calls out in a royal Canterlot voice) BEHOLD! THE POWER OF THE COWARD DISCORD AND OF HARMONY! THIS POWER WAS USED TO CRUSH THOSE PITIFULLY STUPID CREATURES! (Sends the giants against Hypon)
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content:
Hypon's eyes turned white like his mothers and his horn charged a blast, destorying the giants before they came close and most of her army.
Hypon: (Canterlot Voice) Behold! The power of the elements of Harmony, The princesses themselves and the power of friendship and harmony. (Blasts directly at Black Rose a Rainbow blast coming out of his horn and speading across the land around them, also turning the the passed out Discord into Stone and changing Harmony back to its former glory)
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Black Rose:(screams as she starts to turn to stone, turns into a statue)
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon was at Black Rose's statue and was looking down.

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Luna:(walks up to Hypon and nuzzles him) Sweetheart, it's time for dinner. She's not going anywhere.

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon: I'm not hungry, Mom.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: No, not hungry

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Luna:(worried sick) Alright, but don't stay out here all night. Please... (leaves)

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon: I trapped the mare I loved in stone. (Sad) All because of Discord tricking me. Hypon looked down at the ground and started to cry.

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Black Rose's statue stood motionless to Hypon's sadness.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon was extremely heartbroken by his actions, but Hypon knew what he had to do. Hypon took the statue far away back to Harmony and unlocked her from the Stone Cell.

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Black Rose:(awakes from her spot, shakes off dust, sees Hypon, hateful) Why have thou freed me? Not for my power?... No... you freed me for your misguided love. (Spits) Pathetic.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon:(angry) How dare you!? You are a selfish low life and you only think about yourself. You want to take over the world while crushing everyone else aside. You are selfish and inconsiderate. You took my mare away from me, and you will pay. (Hypon zaps her with a powerful memory spell)

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Black Rose:(drops to an knee,winces as memory whirl throughout her mind) Cursed foal, you dare play mind games! (Stands up, zaps Hypon with a powerful mental spell to shock the force of his dark side into power)
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon did changed form but his anger didn't take over his body yet, but Hypon kept blasting more memories upon memories.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Black Rose then blasts away every memory Hypon put in and trapped Hypon in a Dark prison of shadows. Black Rose:(holds Hypon down tight) You will not stop me foal.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Hypon: Where there is darkness, there's light. Hypon then was getting up from Black Rose's Shadow Cell and broke free. Hypon: I'm the son of Light and Darkness, Rose. You cant stop me, filly. I will get my love back. Hypon then tackled Black Rose and kept flashing memories in her head.
1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.title: Next

1521211111111111111111111111211121111111.content: Black Rose was surprised at how strong Hypon was and couldn't get free from his grip. She still fights the memories by putting up a block for Hypon.

153.content: Ever since the Canterlot Wedding of Princess Cadance and Shining Armor, The Changelings have been a threat to all of Equestria, and both sides of the Alicorn Royalty have been searching for Queen Chrysalis and her changelings, but they haven't had any luck finding them. Princesses Luna and Celestia were heading to travel over to the Crystal Empire to have a summit of the Alicorn Royalty. Celestia brought her faithful student and the newest member of the Alicorn Royalty, Princess Twilight Sparkle, while Luna brought her son, Prince Hypon Moonstone. They all finally arrived in the Crystal Empire this morning from riding the Canterlot Express. Hypon knew that Changelings were probobly the most misunderstood ponies in all of Ponyville. He wanted to see the negotiations go well between the ponies and the changelings. Hypon met Chrysalis's daughter on one occasion, Princess Ceka, who was very nice, but she also mentioned her brother, Prince Metamorphosis, who was very brash and hated all ponykind. Twilight had an open mind about the matter and wanted to hear everypony elses opinion.
153.title: Negotiations of Peace

1533.content: Many guards waited for the group to arrive, making sure all arrived safely before the meeting with the Changeling Queen.
1533.title: Some of the guards were waiting for them at the...

choices: Back with the Royal Family of Canterlot
15332.content: Prince Metamorphosis was in his room in the Changeling Cave, grumbling at the thought of being in the same room with the royal family. Prince Metamorphosis never liked ponies, and would treat them as if they were nothing, he would mock the ponies that the changelings captured and punish them without mercy. Metamorphosis and Ceka had to go with Queen Chrysalis to the meeting, which made him furious. Ceka, however, was happy to meet her old friend. Chrysalis was focused about the coming meeting, but then she rounded up her children and some of her guards and started to head to the Crystal Empire.
15332.title: With the Changelings

153322.content: Candance and Rosnesta were teleporting themselves and half of their army, just in case, to the Canterlot Palace. Candance was more than worried but Rosnesta was more than excited to go back to Canterlot and even more to meet a Changeling.
153322.title: With Cadance and Rosnesta

It wasn't a nice meeting to put it in in one way, it ended up with a screaming match until both sets of guards had to drag them away from each other. Twilight was actually excited to meet a changeling friend of Hypon's and see Cadance again. Celestia and Luna were waiting in the throne room and spoke to both Rosnesta and Cadance.
1533221.title: Before the meeting

15332212.content: The Changelings arrive at the front door and go in with their own guards to protect them. Ceka bows to the guards in respect while Metamorphosis pushes past Ceka and the guards before he walks in with his mother. Ceka apologizes for her family and follows her family.

The royal guards of all three families watched the Changelings enter the throne room from the sides of the carpet.

1533221211121112.content: After about an hour, every ponies patience was running out while Chrysalis was telling each pony what here demands were.
1533221211121112.title: Later

choices: A few minutes later, The Meeting is given a break
15332212111211121.content: Hypon already knew their demands before they spoke, They wanted half of Equestria, which everypony knew that It wasn't going to work out. Prince Metamorphosis was so close to losing his patience and just storming out of the throne room because he saw the meeting was going nowhere quickly. Hypon could see it in his eyes and waited for him to do something. Ceka was getting worried about her brother and mother, but was comforted by Hypon's calm voice entering her mind and encouraging her. Cadance was having a sense of worry, but didn't show it, about Chrysalis.
15332212111211121.title: Next

153322121112111212.content: Chrysalis begins to lay down her demands. "Half of Equestria, if not, we'll just kept coming back until you all suffer or surrender to us." Ceka steps in, knowing she would get hurt but didn't care. "It's too much mother, perhaps... a quarter?" Chrysalis however slaps Ceka and threats her. "You dare speak against the good of our empire you softhearted cocoon?! We need more, we starve with what we have!" Metamorphosis nods. "We need more, so give us more, or we'll take it by force!" Celestia and Luna both look at each other with worried looks but both shake their heads.
153322121112111212.title: It starts to heat up

choices: Everypony leaves to Lunch, but Ceka came to his side and spoke
1533221211121112121.content:
Hypon then stood up, knowing this was going to lead to fight, but still did it to defend, "It would be unwise to try to take our land by force, Metamorphosis, We have many of our soliders already in the towns and many more brave stallions and mares willing to join the cause to protect their homes." Metamorphosis turned his face from Hypon and said, "Good, more food for us." Hypon got angry but kept it hidden and countinued, "You forget too easily, Meta, we're not like mindless drones who will listen to your commands, We will fight to protect our own." Hypon took a breath and then sat down in his chair and then added, "But this meeting is for peace, not war, but at least someponies in this room actually know what needs to be done. We must find an agreement or else fate will take it sacrifice."

Hypon's last words rung thoughtout the throne room, but angered Prince Metamorphosis to his breaking point and then screamed at Hypon, who had his eyes closed and head down, "How dare you say that we do not know what needs to be done?" Prince Metamorphosis pointed to family and then countinued, "We are trying to protect our own as well, since our kind is dying from starvation, while you ponies have so much land while we hide in shadows of caves and forests. Bah! If no pony here is going go with our demands, and It seems like war is the only answer." Hypon then looked up and spoke differently than before, "You do not know the path that which you now tread, but by the end of the moon cycle, only one of you will remain. The other two will perish, one, by betrayal, but the other, by blade." Luna and Celestia were shocked to hear Hypon say this, but it wasn't fully Hypon saying these words.

Metamorphosis was steamed and was about to attack Hypon, but Chrysalis stopped him with her hoof and then spoke, "We're done here, come along my children. Chrysalis got up with Metamorphosis and started to walk out the doors with her guards and son, then Ceka started to follow, but then she heard words that made her tiny Changeling heart break for when her mother said, "You are no child of mine." Ceka then stopped and watched her mother and brother walk out the throne room, then she bursted into tears on the floor. But then, A hoof appeared in front of her and she then looked up to see Hypon, offering a hoof to help her up. Ceka accepted it and then hugged Hypon tightly, still crying, while Hypon then spoke in her ear, "You will be alright, Ceka, you don't have to cry." Ceka still cried a little but then looked to see Hypon's smile, which comforted her. Rosnesta was so shocked, along with everypony else to see that Hypon's words did all of this, but Rosnesta was more shocked at the fact that he didn't get angry when Metamorphosis screamed at him, but remained silent. Hypon then slowly brought Ceka back to the table, but as she sat down, Hypon then walked over to the window and watched the Changelings fly out of the Palace and then out of Canterlot. Hypon stayed silent and did not move from the window until...
1533221211121112121.title: The End of the Meeting & The Beginning of the End

15332212111211121211.content:
Luna walks up to Hypon, aware that no pony could hear them from the window if they whispered. "Everypony, another meeting will be held in two hours back in this room, please do not be late, I wish to speak to my son." Everypony left slowly, Ceka being to slowest moving, until Luna and Hypon were alone.

"Hypon... your words concern me. If the time came... would you murder another? I hope this would not be the case for one, I love you with every beat of my heart and also you would lose what makes you prince." Luna looks out a window, distant in her own mind. "You would lose your title and ability to preform magic, you can use magic only for the sake of harmony, and me and my sister..." Luna choked on her emotion and words. "We... we would have to banish and imprison you, if you killed Metamorphosis." Luna looks back at Hypon, eyes full of tears dripping onto her coat. "I want you to make the right decisions, I would rather face magefire than sentence my foal to prison and banish him." Luna leaves before Hypon can say a word, dripping tears on the rug as she left.
15332212111211121211.title: Luna speaks to Hypon

153322121112111212112.content:
Hypon bowed his head, wanting to explain his actions, but he just couldn't say it yet. Hypon never wanted to hurt his mother, but he never knew what his words would do. Hypon stayed silent, until somepony touched him. Hypon looked and saw an translucent white alicorn, named Star Flare. Star Flare had a blue mane and a blue sun as a cutie mark. Star Flare then spoke to Hypon comforting, "You did very well, young prince." Hypon just stayed silent, but Star Flare wrapped a wing around him speaking, "Do not be discouraged, young prince, we knew that this was going to happen, but you will see that everything will be alright." Hypon then looked at Star Flare and finally spoke, "Thanks for the encouragement, Star Flare, I needed all of this encouragement." Hypon then walked towards the staircase, and Star Flare then said to herself, "I see what Absol sees, Hypon is a good son, He is the bright star of Equestria." After she spoke, She vanished from the throne room.

Hypon then came up to the door and saw Ceka was waiting for him. Hypon was surprised to see Ceka, but before he could speak, Ceka hugged him tightly, and surprised him. After a few minutes, Ceka let go of Hypon, and spoke, "Thank you for defending me, Hypon." Hypon knew she was going to say something like this, and simply said, "Thank you, Ceka, but you don't have to thank me." Ceka just then responded, "Yea, I do, Hypon, you protected me and made me feel like a part of your family." Hypon just simply responded, "Because you were already a part of the family, I wasn't going to stand by and watch them attack you and harm you." Ceka then had a smile on her face and then hugged Hypon again.

Put the spoon down and felt kind of wierd eating something mushy

Meanwhile... In another part of the Castle

Luna was wiping her tears into a hankercheif while Cadance was trying to comfort her and Celestia was pondering on what Hypon spoke on..

"If what Hypon said is correct, the changling downfall would occur in thirty days, on the same night as the Lunar Moon Ball." Celestia thought to herself and continued, "How would Hypon be able to predict the future, he never showed any signs of that talent when he was younger, and now, suddenly on the most important day for both changlings and ponykind, he makes one threat that could doom us all.. We must figure out what is the best choice to do for Hypon's actions here today. But that will have to wait for later.."

Luna remained very silent as Cadance tried to comfort her after her emotional talk with her son...

Back with Hypon and Ceka, just entering the Dining Hall

Hypon was carrying a bowl of warm oatmeal and a glass of milk on a tray to where Ceka was sitting and placed it in front of her, hoping she would like to try something new other than how she normally fed. Ceka tried to pick up the spoon and after a few attempts, she picked it up with a little bit of oatmeal and moved it close to her mouth and took a bite of it and she...

This is a time to help heal a fallen friend who needs the kindness she was not given beforehand." Hypon then hugged Ceka closely and then wiped her sudden tears with a nearby handkerchief.

1533221211121112121121212112.title: Rosnesta asks another question

choices: Whatever you want to say, say it here

Ceka is no enemy of ours and is like a sister to me and if you want to say anything; say it here in the midst of another." After that, Hypon sat back down in the chair, showing that even though she was younger and raised in a better home; he was not going to yield as he was older and more knowledgeable on certain events due to experience and age.
153322121112111212112121222.title: Whatever you want to say, say it here
