Ceka also wonder if all alicorns fought like this when deciding on matters, which gave her a small chuckle but quickly hid it from both of the alicorns in front of her.
1533221211121112121121212221.title: Ceka's thoughts as she watched

choices: No, that's the last thing we need to do
1533221211121112121121212222.content: Rosenesta frowned and gave Hypon a glare but spoke to both of them. "Searching for peace failed between us and the changlings. We need to pick the fight with them before they make the first move." Ceka however shook her head and looked down.
1533221211121112121121212222.title: Rosnesta speaks to them both

15332212111211121211212122221.content: Hypon's voice echoed throughout the dining hall as his lips let out the words, "No" and then began to continue as his voice changed to one of consul, "That would be the last thing we need to do, Rose. We should not draw first blood.. However, I am not saying we should not defend our people. The conflict between Changeling and Ponykind will be settle, just not in the way many here see it to be... I have seen each outcome and one I choose to take is the one that has the most hope for both our kinds...even though it makes me look like the bad guy...A prince must rule like he is at a chess match, always thinking three moves ahead..." Hypon stood as he spoke to the empty dining hall that only housed two ponies and a changeling, but Hypon then sat down and continued, "I choose the lesser of many evils, Little Rose, if I must look like the bad guy; so it must be. However, I have given this meeting one last glimmer of hope... It is up for the others to decide how far the light shall spread." Hypon then finished his speech and then relaxed in his chair, hoping that no one overheard his ramble but the mare and changeling...
15332212111211121211212122221.title: No, that's the last thing we need to do

153322121112111212112121222211.content:
Meanwhile, in Celestina's Tower

The four princesses were sitting around a large circled table in Celestia's chambers. "I hope Hypon had a reason for stating what he did, Sister. If not, the next few weeks will show how much he will regret his choice." Celestia spoke with anger. Luna was silent, looking down at the floor with a handkerchief in her hoof, wiling off any tears..Cadence was next to her, consoling her and spoke in Luna's defense, "We know Hypon too well, he would never kill out of spite." This made Luna feel worse...

Celestia then countered, "Hypon trained with some of the best soldiers we had over a few centuries, he knows how to kill and I still think that he is doing this to get back at both Metamorphosis and Chrysalis." Twilight then spoke, "After Chrysalis left, I saw Hypon, just standing by the window, muttering if he was talking to someone." Candace then joined in, "Maybe me and Twilight should take Hypon and Ceka to the Crystal Empire for a few days while you both figure a plan of defense.."

Celestia then intervened, "No, Ceka should stay here where we can watch her. She is a high valued target and letting her leave will leave her open for attack..." Luna then got up spoke, "Hypon's not going to leave with out her and you know it, Sis. She is the only thing that Hypon ever had as a sibling and if you take her away from him will just make matter worse. He cares for her and I think she has a part to play in all this, all of us do..."

The room went silent, but Celestia took a breath and sighed, "Fine, we'll allow both Hypon and Ceka to depart from the Canterlot Train Station for the Crystal Empire tomorrow. I'll just have to make precautions and get an escort for them both..."
153322121112111212112121222211.title: Meanwhile with Luna...

1533221211121112121121212222111.content:
After Hypon's speech, Rosnesta and Ceka went for a walk with a small group of guards in case somepony or changeling got the idea to attack. However, to say things were tense would be an understatement. The guards were a bit concerned about Ceka and the idea of war seemed almost on them. "You will stay in the dungeon all day and night unless asked by royalty." Rosnesta recited from the Royal code on Changelings. "A guard will be posted by the dungeon door, if you need to something, he will help."

Ceka however wasn't paying any attention to Rosnesta's words as she just watched and observed Rosnesta herself. It was clear something was different when she was around Hypon compared to the others, and how she seemed to look at him when he wasn't looking suggested an attachment. Ceka filed this away in her mind for later and continued to walk with Rosnesta, a bit disappointed she was forced to refrain herself from feeding on the guards or her current "ally" , but she could wait until later.
1533221211121112121121212222111.title: Back with Rose and Ceka

15332212111211121211212122221111.content:
Later that night...

As Ceka paced her cell while her guard watched her from the outside, they both could hear the hoofsteps coming towards the cell. Ceka's guard quickly turned to see Prince Hypon who then spoke, "I'm here to check on our guest; however, I must ask for some privacy." The guard was going to interject but he could see how serious Hypon was in his eyes and slowly walked around him and went down two cell blocks.

Hypon then turned to Ceka and smiled before asking, "How have they been treating you, Ceka?" Hypon showed a little concern as he heard things from the other guards, already talking about the coming war...
15332212111211121211212122221111.title: That night

153322121112111212112121222211111.content: Ceka sighed and responded with a slightly annoyed look. "Your guards seem to think I am some monster about to go on a rampage. If I even look towards a guard, they either flinch and move away, or they ready whatever weapon they possess. I understand security is important, but this is a bit much." To prove her point, she glanced over to the guard watching them, who suddenly looked away and gave them more space. " It reminds me of the hive, if I am outside of the royal areas, my kind are required to stay away from me. My... mother didn't want anything to happen to me." Ceka stated as she looked back at Hypon. "How is it outside?"
153322121112111212112121222211111.title: Next

choices: Ceka gets curious about their trip
Ceka is silent for a moment
1533221211121112121121212222111111.content: Hypon then answered, "It is getting tense, Ceka, but my mother was able to convince Celestia for me, you, and Twilight to spend a week in the Crystal Empire with my cousin and her family. But the guards are getting ready for war, which scares me a little bit; however, I still believe my vision is still running on its course."
1533221211121112121121212222111111.title: Tense

choices: It's an ally and it will be fun
Where would you rather be, if not there?
15332212111211121211212122221111111.content: Ceka perked up when she heard Hypon say Crystal Empire and moved closer to the bars of the cell she was resting in. " The Crystal Empire? May I ask why we would go there? And that alicorn... Twilight... will be there, as well as that... pink alicorn?" Ceka shook her head slightly and rubbed her head. "I was hoping for a quiet retreat, somewhere dark perhaps, not...sparkling in light and... talkative ponies. Besides my presence in that empire may cause trouble, at the very most, attention."
15332212111211121211212122221111111.title: Ceka gets curious about their trip

153322121112111212112121222211111111.content:
Hypon then explained, "The Crystal Empire is an ally of ours and should be ready if anyone would try to attack it; since the kingdom is located in Northern Equestria, pass the Tundra... Plus, it should be very fun for you. The Crystal Empire does have the oldest library in Equestria and has very beautiful night skies. Sure, both Rose and Twilight will be with us; but that does not mean I won't be with you through the week. I will make sure that you will be under my watch during this little break. I think you will enjoy it."

Hypon smiled and then moved closer to Ceka and looked into her eyes, hoping that she would accept the offer...
153322121112111212112121222211111111.title: It's an ally and it will be fun

1533221211121112121121212222111111111.content: Hypon saw Ceka raise an eyebrow with curiosity and sat near the door to the cell, and started to ask in a joking way. " And how Prince Moonstone of Canterlot shall you entertain the once Princess of the Changelings?" Ceka did however like the idea of the skies there and the library, but she also had never really been there so she didn't know what they would be able to do.
1533221211121112121121212222111111111.title: Ceka asks for more info

1533221211121112121121212222111111112.content: Hypon saw Ceka looked a little bit nervous when he mentioned being close for the trip but quickly shakes it off and clears her throat. "Ahem, perhaps I will, Prince Moonstone. I just hope Twilight and that Rosnesta don't spy on us the whole time, or at least get better at it."
1533221211121112121121212222111111112.title: Ceka gets nervous

15332212111211121211212122221111111121.content: Hypon then added, "I wish I could promise that no one would spy on our talks or conservations. They don't trust you like I do, Ceka, and they are just trying to do what is best for their beliefs. However, I will try to be by your side throughout this trip."
15332212111211121211212122221111111121.title: Next

153322121112111212112121222211111111211.content: Ceka blushed and tried to hide it by opening a book and pretending to read it in front of her face. "Er... I hope so Prince, now I know you must be tired and you should get some sleep for the journey. I will just read until I hear we are ready to go."
153322121112111212112121222211111111211.title: Ceka continues to blush

choices: Ceka was asleep with her face in a book
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content:
2 Hours before Sunrise...

Hypon then walked back down into the dungeon and prepared to get Ceka, since both of princesses Luna and Celestia wanted to get Ceka before any pony else was awake to see that a changeling was still among them.

Hypon and the others were already prepared for the trip and had their luggage already on the train, but insisted that Hypon alone should get Ceka, since she was still shy around the others.
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: The next morning

1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content: Ceka was still reading when Hypon made it to her cell, but was getting tired with sunrise coming soon. After she rubbed her eyes, she looked up to see Hypon and smiled before she put down her book. "Time to go?" Hypon looked over and saw that she had only one bag, which compared to royalty was very light, not to mention it looked like most of the weight in it were books.
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Ceka was still up, reading

choices: Ceka would like to carry her own luggage
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content: Hypon nodded to Ceka and added, "Yes, Princess. I hope you don't mind me asking; but, may I carry your bag? It is late and you've been up for a long time... Hypon watched as Ceka walked over to her cloak and slowly picked it up to put it over her body...
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Next

1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content: Ceka put on her cloak and nodded to Hypon. "I suppose so Hypon, but we should get moving before they leave us behind." Ceka then put up her hood and lead Hypon out of the dungeon while he carried her bag. "I am looking forward to the nights at the Crystal Empire."
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Ceka doesn't mind

1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content:
Hypon just smiled at Ceka's curious side and then spoke, "I think you will enjoy the week in a different place, Ceka. But just remember, I do not believe the citizens of the Crystal Empire might not have seen a changeling before; so don't be afraid if they stare at you, Ceka."

Both Ceka and Hypon continued through Canterlot in the middle of the night, making sure that nopony else was around or was watching them walk.
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Next

1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content: Since all of them couldn't fit into one coach, Princess Celestia and Luna were in one while Ceka, Hypon, Rosnesta and Twilight were in another. This turned out to be a good idea since the princesses got the majority of attention off of Ceka, despite a small group of ponies. Rosnesta and Twilight were playing cards while Ceka was fast asleep beside Hypon, quickly dozing off when the sun came up. "Ha! Full house!" Rosnesta proclaimed as Twilight put her head down on the table in front of them.
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Later, during the Train Ride

choices: Later, when they get to the Crystal Empire
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content: Hypon just smiled at Twilight's defeat in poker and moved his wing over Ceka's face so that the sunlight wouldn't wake up Ceka and then spoke to both of the mares, "Seems like one of us is already down. How long till the next one falls?" Hypon yawned after he said his comment, not used to being up at least two hours before sunrise.
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Next

1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content: Twilight slowly raised her head and gave all of her chips to Rosnesta before she got up and went over to Hypon. "She's out like a light, you should go take my place and beat Rosnesta. I'll stay near her and keep the sun off of her." Hypon noticed Rosnesta was looking happy but also noticed a few of the other ponies in the coach staring at Ceka like she was an alien.
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Twilight asks Hypon a question

1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content: Hypon then looked at the ponies and saw that they quickly turned their heads and spoke, "I'll play cards in a moment, but I better speak to them before they get any wild ideas." Hypon slowly got up and let Twilight take his place as he exited the cabin and then walked over to the other cabin.
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Talk to the ponies staring

1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content: When Hypon went over to the ponies, they refused to look at him and just looked outside the window. "You're helping an enemy of Canterlot, how could you prince?" One of the ponies asked.
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Next

1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content: Hypon then spoke, "She is not our enemy and is nothing like her mother. If you think that all changelings are enemies, you are being very stereotypical. She was abandoned and disowned by her family, which is very tragic for anyone to endure. But, out of the three changeling members there, she was the only one who wants peace between us. If you think she is an enemy, I won't stop you from thinking that; however, I can tell you that she is nothing like her family. You judge her by what she looks like, but sometimes we are blind from the truth." Hypon then took a breath and then finished, "I am not one to lecture, but if you got to know her like I did during the summit; you would see what I saw."
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Next

choices: Refuse to leave it at that
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content: The ponies who stared at Ceka just looked away from Hypon until he feel the gentle hoof of Ceka's on his back. " It's not worth it Hypon, those fears are based from centuries of well-founded terror, not to mention the fears cause when my mother last visited the Crystal Empire. There is nothing you can do at this point." Ceka stated as she started to pull Hypon away from the wide eyed ponies who moved away when she got close.
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Next

1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content: Hypon just sighed and then turned to leave the coach, but before leaving; he turned his head to say his final word on the matter, "You are so wrong to judge her just because she is a changeling." After that, Hypon left the cabin and walked back into the cabin along with Ceka and sat at the table with Rosnesta and divided the chips and didn't say a word as he shuffled the deck...
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Let it go

choices: Maybe later, after some more sleep Ceka
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content: "You know Prince," Ceka added as she rubbed her eye and sat at the playing table. "I don't think I know this game. How about you show me how to play?" Hypon noticed Ceka still looked a bit tired, but the interest in her eyes showed she wouldn't easily walk away. She also was trying to get Hypon's mind off their rude passengers how were staring holes into both of them while Twilight and Rosnesta did the same to them.
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Next

choices: Lie down for a nap before you arrive
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content:
After the ponies who were staring at Ceka moved to another coach, things started to lighten up as Twilight and Rosnesta taught Ceka how to play cards, which in the first few minutes she ended up losing 10 bits to both mareshwhile Hypon watched. Hypon looked out the window and noticed that the sky was getting darker as they moved along the track, yet it seemed a bit early for the sun to go down. In the far distance, Hypon could see the pinprick in the distance that was the Crystal Empire, but it would take them at least another couple of hours when it was dark to arrive.

The darkening sky a seemed to have an effect on the mares as Rosnesta and Twilight went down for a nap, but Ceka was wide awake and sat with Hypon as she watched the clouds roll by.
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Later

1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content: Hypon and Ceka were walking around the throne room while Celestia, Luna and Twilight were talking to Shining Armor and Cadence. "We will be happy to assist you by letting you stay here, however, it would be safer for the Changeling Princess to remain in her chambers instead of going out into the city. Not only has their been sightings outside of our empi're's walls, but also inside. Until we find out if these rumors and sightings are true, everyone should remain here." Cadence told everyone as Ceka looked up with concern.
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Later, when they get to the Crystal Empire

1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content: Ceka put on her cloak and put her hood up, however she lifted the bag with little to no effort and slung it onto her back. "I am quite fine with carrying my own weight Prince, but I appreciate the offer. Shall you lead the way?"
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Ceka would like to carry her own luggage

1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content: Hypon just smiled and lead Ceka through the palace and pass the gates, leading her through the heart of the capital city. Canterlot always had beauty in the midnight hours, but Ceka was not raised in the capital city and Hypon hoped that Ceka wouldn't get distracted while they walked towards the Train Station...
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Hypon smiles and they go

1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content: Everypony was keeping busy with some games while in the corner, Ceka was fast asleep with her hood and cloak covering her like a blanket. On the way to their seat, Ceka gave one of the service staff a fright, but with the tip she gave, the staff member welcomed them happily and made sure they were satisfied.
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Later, on the train ride...

1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content: Hypon was close to Ceka as she slept, making sure if she woke up that she would be okay and taken care of. However, Hypon looked out the window for some time while waiting for Twilight to reshuffle the card deck and Rosnesta to set up the table and chips...
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Next

1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content: Twilight and Rosnesta would occasionally look up at Hypon and noticed how protective he was being to the Changeling Princess. It started to bother Rosnesta enough that when Hypon looked in her direction, she offered him the pack of cards. " She will be out most of the trip, you can relax and get your rear beat in cards by your friends without worrying over her." Rosnesta stated bluntly with a small confident smile as she offered him a chance to play.
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Next

1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content: However when Hypon came down to the cell Ceka was staying in, Ceka was fast asleep with a book covering her face. Hypon had to admit, it was a little cute considering she was a princess to the Changelings, and she could pass for a normal mare if not for the obvious differences.
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Ceka was asleep with her face in a book

1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content: Hypon just smiled as he grabbed the nearby key and unlocked Ceka's cell, walking in slowly so he wouldn't disturb her slumber. As Hypon moved closer, he saw in many ways how she could be mistaken as a normal mare. Hypon, however, knew that time was short and then placed a hoof on Ceka's neck and shook her gently. "Ceka" Hypon began, "It is time to wake up..."
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Next

1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content: Ceka slowly started to stir before she moved the book off of her face, wiping a little drool away but still very sleepy. "Mmm? Time to go... already?" Ceka then sluggishly got off her bed and started to move towards her bag, which was prepared beforehand.
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Ceka slowly wakes up

1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.content: Ceka quickly woke up and moved the book off her face before she stood up. "I'm normally asleep at this time, but I guess with you here that we need to get moving." Ceka then stretched before she suddenly changed into a silver earth pony with a cutiemark of a bar of silver. "Is this acceptable so other ponies won't see the real me?" Ceka asked Hypon as she check how she looked.
1533221211121112121121212222111111112111.title: Ceka quickly wakes

choices: Shining Armor knocks on the door
154.content:
Sombra, the dark ruler and past king of the Crystal Kingdom, was defeated by Rosnesta's mother when his first return. After Sombra's defeat, Peace and Calmness ruled over Crystal Kingdom. Cadance and Shining Armor soon taught Rosnesta about Sombra and his orgins that go back to the rise of the Celestia and Luna's reign. Sombra was a crystal pony unicorn who was taught by Star Swirl the Bearded. Years Later, when Discord took control, Sombra was in Canterlot Castle and found a giant hole in the wall, where a giant hall of scrolls were collecting dust. These scrolls were mostly dark magic scrolls and were forbidden to everypony except the royal sisters and other rulers. Sombra had a power hungry personality and stolen a couple of dark magic scrolls and performed them later. Sombra's personality became darker and he wanted to rule to the Crystal Empire with an iron hoof. But since he was defeated the first time, Sombra became an enity of evil and the only thing he wants is to rule the Crystal Empire. Rosnesta knew that she would have to face Sombra in the coming future, but she didn't expect it would be coming soon.

It was a week before the Crystal Faire and Rosnesta and Princess Cadance were getting ready for it. Rosnesta was checking on every single part of the Crystal Faire, while Cadance and Shining Armor were preparing the castle. Rosnesta was now on a break and was resting in her royal tower. Rosnesta was thinking about the Crystal Faire and about the things about Sombra's past. Rosnesta was very deep in thought about both these items, until a letter appeared in front of Rosnesta, breaking her train of thought. Rosnesta saw that it was a royal letter from Canterlot. Rosnesta had a smile on her face when she saw the letter when she saw it was from Prince Hypon, son of Princess Luna. Rosnesta then opened up the letter and started to read it.

"My dearest Rosnesta,
I am sending this letter to tell you in advance that me, my mother, and Aunt Celestia will be coming to the Crystal Faire early to help you and your family prepare for the Faire. I think we shall arrive by tomorrow afternoon. But we shall have to see if we can meet that timeline. I am very excited to actually to go to the Crystal Kingdom and see your home. I have seen your pictures that you sent me and I cant wait to see it for myself. Missing you very much and thinking about you always."
-Your prince, Hypon

Rosnesta smiled at Hypon's excitement and started to write back to Hypon.
154.title: Darkness rising

155.content: How about some more situations?
155.title: Other situations

info.brief_description: Rosnesta shows the world that even a mare can be awesome
info.description: I decided to go into a MLP interactive after Hypon did a Life story of his stallion alicorn. Yes I am a guy but don't hate on something that really is kick ass, you might like it if you try it. So yeah, I made this story since Shining Armor and Candance are married and it seemed perfect for a newborn to jump in there. Fan characters are welcome as long they are ponies, add with pride. Enjoy.
